titles: Facial Anatomy

A.1
<size=24>B.UP Technique is a structured treatment algorithm, based in facial anatomy, adressing facial sagging and facial jowling without increasing midfacial volume.</size>

A.2
<size=24>Line of ligaments is crucial to start.</size>

A.3
<size=24>Injections into the medial will result majorly in VOLUMIZING effects.</size>

A.4
<size=24>Injections into the lateral face will result in majorly LIFTING effects.</size>

A.5
<size=24>Injecting in the right place, Belotero Volume is going to work like an anchor to the ligaments, producing a lifting effect.</size>

A.6
<size=24>ORL: Orbital Retaining Ligament
ZCL: Zygomatic Cutaneous Ligaments
ZA: Zygomatic Arch</size>

A.7
<size=22>STS: Superficial Temporal Septum
ITS: Inferior Temporal Septum
</size>

A.8
<size=22>SUTC: Superficial Upper Temporal Compartment
SLTC: Superficial Lower Temporal Compartment
</size>
A.9 Descending: 1: Superficial nasolabial 3: Middle cheek 7: Superficial jowl
A.10 Stables: 2: Malar fat 4: Lateral cheek 5: Superior superficial temple 6: Inferior superficial temple

Step 1
<size=24>Apply Anesthesia</size>

1.1
<size=24>Dermal insertion point is 1 cm anterior to the tragus.</size>

1.2
<size=24>Inject 0.5 ml lidocaine.</size>

Step 2
<size=24>Insert Cannula</size>

2.1
<size=24>Insert the cannula into the marked point.</size>

2.2
<size=24>Subdermal product placement is essential.</size>
2.3 Descending: 1: Superficial nasolabial 3: Middle cheek 7: Superficial jowl
2.4 Stables: 2: Malar fat 4: Lateral cheek 5: Superior superficial temple 6: Inferior superficial temple

2.5
<size=24>Bup positions the cannula bevel up – until the temple region.</size>

Step 3
<size=24>Apply Product</size>

3.1
<size=24>Tilt the cannula against the skin to verify superficial position.</size>

3.2
<size=24>Only bolus, no fanning. Compress the injection canal to avoid retrograde product flow. Assist bolus formation with your non-dominant hand.</size>

Step 4
<size=24>Apply on the opposite side
Repeat</size>

4.1
<size=24>Bup improves facial sagging, ioncreases jawline contouring, improves “Marionette” lines.</size>

content.ref:
Estas recomendaciones son una guía.
Recuerda realizar siempre un tratamiento a la medida de cada paciente.
